text: Gershon Shafat (, 6 December 1927 – 16 August 2020) was an Austrian-born Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset for Tehiya from 1984 to 1992. He was born in Vienna. He became a member of the Bnei Akiva youth movement, and later joined the National Religious Party. In 1946 he was amongst the founders of kibbutz Ein Tzurim. Shafat died on 16 August 2020 in Tel Aviv, aged 92.גרשון שפט הלך לעולמו Israel National News, 16 August 2020 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Israeli politicians Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Gershon Shafat
